snippet.title: Persona 3 Reload - (FeMC Mod) Add On P3P Kotone Cutscene Project For Reload
snippet.description:
Please Read the Description!!!  Video contains heavy spoilers!!!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can now download an Add-On to have the fan made Persona 3 Kotone Cutscene Project into P3R.  Please keep in mind not all cutscenes are replaced due to specific Tech Limitations namely the 3D ingame looking cg cutscenes are not replaced or other ones anime scenes like Yakushima swimwear scene due to no anime cutscene of equal was done before.  So do not expect the full experience or all scenes replaced.  This video is just demoing what's available currently in version 1.0.1.  If there is a scene not shown it's because they have not been replaced.  This is not included in the main FeMC Reload Project Mod you have to download this separately.

P3P Kotone Cutscene Project Reload Port Mod Link:
https://gamebanana.com/mods/547359

P3 Reload FEMC mod.  Download the Latest Version from Here.
https://github.com/MadMax1960/Femc-Reloaded-Project
https://discord.gg/TyR8RVZeNx

Instructions to Install the Mod:
https://youtu.be/HNYRgqXCzMM?si=_5h-SI9vie43DH7c

Femc Config Adjuster
https://github.com/MadMax1960/Femc-Config-Adjuster/releases

Original P3P Kotone Cutscene Project channel
@Neptune_1313 

Credits
Neptune13, Commando/julian, TheBestAstroNOT, Merfie, Eshap, Tiny Tango, ZeoNyph, GabiShy, A_Ratt, Keku, Lueseba, AkiraJkr, Lupin the Enigma, ZeldaKid, Euphonia.exe, Cocobucker, Kindred, kitukun, Mellodi, Elunoir Unlovable, Stelldubs, The Daphinator, Krysdolly, Upscale Designer, ltsophia, Alexankitty, Mosq_, jen

Timestamp
-----------------
0:00 Opening
1:49 Opening New Game
5:08 Gekkoukan High Train and Intro
6:40 Tartarus Intro
7:55 Yakushima Opening
8:41 The T Cross Scene
10:17 Kyoto Train Station Scene
11:37 Aigis vs Death
14:53 Nyx Summons the Tartarus visible
17:17 The Wild Card
20:00 Tartarus no more
22:12 Mitsuru's Speech endgame
23:52 Bonus little ending.
